Adapters.Cisco Prime Service Catalog Adapter.Retry Time Period (minutes)
Adapters.Cisco Prime Service Catalog Adapter.Retry Frequency (seconds)

ActivityNode.Notes:
This needs to exist because the device role is a mutually exclusive option and trying to perform configuration of two roles on a device will cause the configuration to fail. This restriction really should be performed in the UI rather than letting the user add multiple roles to a device.
If you remove this branch and a device is configured with multiple roles, the "Add VLAN to Upstream Trunk Interface" will fail because you can't add VLANs to an interface if that physical interface has subinterfaces on it. The switch won't allow it, the command will fail and the device will be in an inconsistent mode.

ResultMessage.FormattedCode: Multiple roles have been defined for the device '{0}'. A device can only have a single role, please reconfigure this device in the Service Portal to only have one role.

VariableReference.DisplayPath: Workflow.Find Device Role SI's.Service Items.Row Count

ActivityNode.Notes: This branch has to exist because the next branch checks for the first item in the results table and will fail if there are no rows. This condition will succeed if there are no rows, so it will never reach the next branch.
